ЕБАНЫЕ ВЫБЛЯДКИ РАЗРАБЫ, ЗДРАВСТВУЙТЕ. НЕНАВИЖУ БЛЯТЬ ВАС ВСЕМ СЕРДЦЕМ И ДУШОЙ НАХУЙ. ЭТО БЫЛА АХУЕННАЯ ИГРА, НЕТ СУКА ВАМ НАДО ДОБАВИТЬ АННУ, ДОКТОРА, ЛЕГИОНА БЛЯТЬ И ТД. ПОФИКСИТЬ В ЛУЧШУЮ СТОРОНУ МАНЬЯКОВ И ПРЕВРАТИТЬ ИГРУ В ПОЛНОЕ ДЕРЬМО НАХУЙ. ПОЛНОЕ ИМБАЛАНСНОЕ ДЕРЬМО. КАКИМ НАХУЙ ХУЕМ Я СБЕГУ НАПРИМЕР, ЕСЛИ ВЫ ДАЛИ ВОЗМОЖНОСТЬ МАНЬЯКУ  ЗАКРЫВАТЬ ЛЮК, А Я ЛЕЖУ НАХУЙ В ПРЕДСМЕРТНОМ СОСТОЯНИИ??? А НАХУЙ? ЧТОБ БЛЯТЬ ВЫ ИЗ ДОМА ВЫШЛИ И КЛЮЧ НАХУЙ ЗАБЫЛИ, ЧТОБЫ ХУЙ ЗАЙТИ ДОМОЙ. ЕБАЛ ВАС ВСЕХ ТРЕХМЕТРОВЫМ ШЛАНГОМ, ПЕДИКИ ЕБУЧИЕ. УЙДИТЕ НАХУЙ ИЗ ЭТОЙ ИГРЫ, ЭТО НЕ ВАШЕ БЛЯТЬ. ВЕРНИТЕ НАМ СТАРЫЙ ДБД, СТАРЫЙ АХУЕННЫЙ ДБД, УЕБКИ ССАНЫЕ. А ТОТ КТО БЛЯТЬ ПРИДУМАЛ КАРТУ МЯСОКОМБИНАТ ГИДЕОН ВООБЩЕ ПОХОДУ ОТБИТЫЙ НАПРОЧЬ. ВООБЩЕМ ВЫВОД ИЗ ВСЕГО СКАЗАНОГО: ВЫ УБИЛИ СВОЮ ИГРУ И ТЕМ САМЫМ УБИЛИ ДОВЕРИЕ ИГРОКОВ ЭТОЙ САМОЙ ИГРЫ. ЖЕЛАЮ ВАМ СЧАСТЬЯ БЛЯТЬ В ЖИЗНИ И НАДУЮСЬ ВЫ УЙДЁТЕ ИЗ РАЗРАБОТКИ ИГР. СПАСИБО НАХУЙ.

Gran juego. 

Mucho contenido para aprender y desbloquear. Llevo casi 500 horas jugadas, no desbloquié la mitad de las cosas aún y siguen saliendo nuevos personajes y mapas.

No es pay-to-win(como otros comentarios afirman). Hay personajes que, por copyright, solamente se pueden desbloquear con dinero real, pero el resto se pueden obtener sólo jugando.

Como cualquier multiplayer, habrá partidas con gente tóxica y otras donde te tocan los mejores compañeros.

Para ser buen superviviente tendrás que jugar de killer, y aprender de que el killer tiene un punto de vista(FoV) muy limitado. Para ser buen killer, juega de superviviente. Verás lo fácil que se esconden a simple vista.

Hay muchas quejas en la comunidad de que "superviviente/killer está mas fuerte que killer/superviviente", pero no prestes atención a eso. Cada uno de ellos juega  más de un lado que del otro, en especial los novatos, y siempre se va a quejar que el otro tiene la ventaja. Sólo los jugadores que juegan tanto superviviente como killer pueden hacer un buen análisis de eso.
I highly recomend this game, because its fun, even if it need some balance....the rank difference is quite big in games

Artılar : Başarılı bir atmosfer, ek ücretli de olsa geniş Katil opsiyonu,Harika soundtrack.

Orta : Kurbanlar  ile katillerin dengesi biraz kaçmış gibi.Katiller bir nebze daha avantajsız
Belki benim "Perk"leri iyi ayarlayamam dan olabilir ama "Perk" lerin çok fazla etkisi olduğunu göremedim Katil tarafında.

Eksiler: Katillerin Kurban etme şekilleri tek düze,Teklifler ile şansınız ve kabiliyetiniz varsa sanırım değişik bitirişler yapabiliyorsunuz ama onun dışında efsanevi "finish him" yok. En azından son kurbanda bir şenlik bekliyor insan doğrusu, emeğe saygı :)

Genel olarak oynanış orta, Grafikler iyi, Keyif iyi  :)

Great game

Would only recommend it either for people I hate or people who play only once in a while and will therefore barely notice all the negative aspects of this game:

- the community is beyond atrocious, a lot of people in the community will insult people whenever they don't get their way and will equally cry to the devs to make changes to the game to make the game easier for them rather than getting better and will resort to applying pressure through a mob mentality of flooding the steam forums with negative reviews whenever they don't get what they want, and flood every form of media with negative information about the game until they get what they want. And this toxicity by no means stays limited to this game, but spoils over to other asymmetrical games where people from this community try and put pressure on the developers of other asymmetrical games to make it as bad as this game. Whatever decent person you find among the community, you should treasure it, because it's a very exceptional and rare occurance.

- the balance is even worse to the point that playing survivor is just beyond boring because of how easy it is unless your teammates are just brand new and killer is just massively frustrating whenever the survivors know what they are doing, so it's only fun playing with your friends because of the social interaction, not because of the game.

- the developers are bad, who make promises they never keep, will lie to your face, repeatedly insult the skill of one side of the game while repeatedly insulting the intelligence of the other. And equally take no personal responsibility for any of their own actions, but always resort to deflecting it back onto the playerbase itself.

- The gameplay is beyond boring and repetative. If you came looking for a horror game of one fearsome killer taking on 4 survivors you came to the wrong place. Instead it's exceptionally repetative and boring gameplay where as a survivor all you do is hold m1 on a generator or when you've been found by the killer all you do is run around in circles and throw pallets on the killer's face with not much counterplay. And as the killer, you just get bullied unless the survivors are bad. It's on them to make the mistakes and it's on you as a killer to capitalize on them. If they don't make mistakes that are big enough for you to be able to capitalize on, you don't get kills and it's that simple. So instead of it being 1 killer vs 4 survivors it's one high school nerd in a "spooky" halloween custome taking on 4 bullies with super powers.

- There is no change in the meta or anything. After more than 3 years the gameplay nor the meta has changed in any significant way. It's always been nothing but running around in circles for killers and adding holding m1 to that for survivors.

- The content of many abilities are just not suitable for a game that is supposed to be in the "horror" genre. The tools that survivors have are beyond ridiculous where for every single situation a survivor could be in they have a get out of jail freecard they can equip in their perk slots. Which completely ruins all the immersion of the game, because no matter what situation you are in there's a guaranteed way out of it. That's on top of the fact that every single pallet on a map is effectively a safezone until the pallet has been dropped.

- Issues don't get fixed, they only get bandaid fixes. So whatever is wrong with this game is never going to get fixed, instead people will repeatedly get bandaids in the form of flawed mechanics or perks you have to purchase through paid DLC content so you can "deal" with a specific issue. And unfortunately you don't have enough perkslots to equip all of the bandaids required to deal with all of the issues. Therefore you'll always necessarily be stuck with a set of issues and you just have to choose between which 4 issues (at most) you want to insufficiently get addressed and which remaining issues you won't be able to address at all.

- Quantity over quality. Ultimately the devs care more about what the loudest, most unreasonable, selfish and malicious majority want, because the developers care more about making money than providing quality content. Hence constantly pushing for new paid DLC's instead of fixing and changing up the game in any meaningful fashion.

So overall avoid it at all cost, there are better asymmetrical games out there with developers who are actually passionate about their games and care about improving the quality of said games.

As a result of all this you have a large community of a bunch of entitled sociopaths with an overinflated ego that doesn't in any way shape or form match their actual accomplishments and a group of developers who in turn feed that ego which they in turn convert into hard currency and both of these feed eachother and feed off of eachother. Add poor quality content to match the poor quality community and the poor quality developers and that's "Dead By Daylight" in a nutshell.

0/10.

i've been playing this game for 800 hrs, and i can say never been this game were so balanced, it is glorious hours for both killer and survivor mains. just a few month ago, i feel so hopeless and almost uninstalled, and i think most of the regular player were thinking the same. because dbd going to the point where deathgarden losing it's base player. dbd and supposedly deathgarden were horror surviving game, but devs somehow always listened to spoiled and idiot players, making this game losing it's horror surviving element and become the horrible bully simulator. 

devs learnt from the experience and now as i said previously, this game almost perfectly balanced. even toxic swf still lurking, but i believe dbd will took your times as i did

Хочу сказать разрабам, что какие же они гении, когда ты только скачал игру, которая весит 35 ГБ,(В Сис.Треб. написано что хватит 25 ГБ свободного места).
Господи, я так никогда не ошибался, дело в том, что не у каждого есть огромный ЖД, и я бы не стал покупать игру, зная что она мне не так сильно зайдёт, еще и места требует по факту около 50 ГБ, т.к. прошлые обновления не удаляются, они копятся и копятся, у меня эта игра занимала 42 гб, и ей этого мало.
Спасибо разрабам, за то что эта игра  весит столько, сколько не весит даже PUBG(28-32 ГБ).
Если вам заходят игры такого типа, и у вас очень много места на ЖД или ССД, то рекомендую, я честно говоря лучше бы взял Пятницу 13, она и поинтересней.ИМХО

Возникла такая проблема. Игра со стимом на ссд. Все нормально идет, пока игра не решает обновиться. Когда это случается, то вся свободная часть, будь это 100 гб или 200 гб заполняется вся нахуй. Это именно при обнове это дебильной игры. Заполняется все до 3 гб, скорость идет к хуям. Когда обнова заканчивается, то все приходит в норму. Ссд проверял, с ним все порядке. Что эти проклятые ублюдки суют в обновы? Что блять заполняет диск. Короче хуйня. ( В итоге обнова на 400мб загружается 40 мин, при скорости чтения 70мб/с). Они сделали PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR
